title: Create and integrate Stack Teacher logo

requirements.text: Generate a Stack Teacher logo image combining an icon/symbol with a text-based wordmark. The icon should visually represent stacked layers or blocks (evoking knowledge stacks, tech layers, or curriculum phases). The wordmark should read 'Stack Teacher' in a clean, modern, professional font. The overall style must be tech-educational: sharp, credible, and forward-looking, using the existing site color palette (dark backgrounds with accent tones). Produce the logo in a horizontal layout (icon left, text right) and a standalone icon-only variant.

quotes: MAKE A logo for the website suited to the desing and feel
it should resonate with the project buit

acceptanceCriteria: A horizontal logo image (icon + 'Stack Teacher' wordmark) is generated and saved under frontend/public/assets/generated/
A standalone icon-only variant is generated and saved under frontend/public/assets/generated/
The logo style is consistent with the site's existing tech-educational aesthetic and color palette
The icon clearly conveys stacked layers, blocks, or a teaching/knowledge metaphor

requirements.text: Integrate the generated Stack Teacher logo into the website's sticky header (Layout.tsx) to replace any existing text-only or placeholder brand mark. Use the horizontal (icon + wordmark) variant in the header. Ensure the logo is appropriately sized for the navbar, responsive on mobile (shrinks gracefully or uses icon-only variant on small screens), and links to the home page.

quotes: MAKE A logo for the website suited to the desing and feel
it should resonate with the project buit

acceptanceCriteria: The sticky header in Layout.tsx displays the Stack Teacher logo (horizontal variant) instead of plain text
The logo links to the home page ('/')
On mobile viewports the logo remains visible and does not overflow the header
The logo renders clearly on the site's dark/light header background without visual artifacts

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Logo images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/ — do not route them through the backend
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall site color scheme or layout
Creating animated or SVG-code-based logos — static image assets are sufficient
Adding a logo to any page other than the shared header

required: Horizontal logo combining a stacked-layers geometric icon (three offset rectangular blocks forming a tower, in teal/cyan accent on dark) with the wordmark 'Stack Teacher' in a clean sans-serif font — tech-educational, sharp, modern (stack-teacher-logo-horizontal.dim_400x100.png)
Standalone icon-only version of the stacked-layers geometric mark from the Stack Teacher logo, same accent color, square format (stack-teacher-icon.dim_128x128.png)
